com.devtence.will.dev.models

Class BaseModel<T extends BaseModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.models.BaseModel<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Author, Category, Client, Configuration, Content, Language, Notification, Role, Search, User, UserPasswordReset

    public abstract class BaseModel<T extends BaseModel>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class created to serve as the base for the models that use Google Cloud Datastore for persistence. Defines basic methods every model must have, and implements basic functions like paginated listings. It's very important that every Model must be registered on the DbObjectify Class otherwise it'll fail on execution.
    Since:
    2015-07-18
    Author:
    sorcerer
    See Also:
    DbObjectify

      • getList

        public static ListItem getList(java.lang.String startAt,
               int limit,
               java.lang.Class className,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> sortFields,
               java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> sortDirs)
        Method that returns a basic list using cursors and pagination. Also implements multiple field sort.
        Parameters:
        startAt - Defines the position of the cursor to use if it exists
        limit - Maximum number of items to be returned
        className - class name for the elements to search
        sortFields - List of fields for sorting the result list
        sortDirs - List sort direction for each of the sorting fields specified in sortFields. Must match the items on the sortFields argument.
        Returns:
        List of items sorted and paginated

      • getAll

        public static java.util.List getAll(java.lang.Class className)
        Returns a list that contains all the elements in the collection from the Google Cloud Datastore. Important note: this method is not recommended for very large collections, it doesn't use pagination or cursors so it'll be very expensive to use.
        Parameters:
        className - Class of the collection to return
        Returns:
        List of objects

      • get

        public static java.lang.Object get(long id,
                   java.lang.Class className)
        Returns an object from the Google Cloud Datastore collection specified by it's ID.
        Parameters:
        id - unique identifier on the collection
        className - class of the model to search
        Returns:
        object that matches the class defined and the id
